common.howToInstall: How to install to the home screen?

oldBobr.intro1: Hello, grandson! You finally bought your own hut... Even if it's with a mortgage, you're still doing great!
oldBobr.intro2: It's a bit empty inside... But I saw some furniture nearby while I was walking here. You can look for it.
oldBobr.introRepeat1: I saw some furniture nearby while I was walking here. You can look for it.
oldBobr.introRepeat2: It's a nice day for a walk, don't you think?
oldBobr.introRepeat3: The house won't furnish itself... Time to get to work!
oldBobr.giveLuckyCharm1: Oh, I almost forgot! Here, take this for good luck...
oldBobr.giveLuckyCharm2: It's my lucky charm. May it protect you as it once protected me.
